I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?C : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?C : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?n : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- nat]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 vec_nil vec_nil -> (forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n0) (a ## v1) (b ## v2)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : vec ?A n0), P n0 (h ## t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type]
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (a ## vec_nil)) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v -> P (S n0) (a ## v)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n tmp : pos n zero : pos n Hst : src <> tmp Hsz : src <> zero Htz : tmp <> zero i : nat |- Type]
mm_push_Zero = mm_transfert src tmp zero i ++ mm_mul2 tmp src zero (3 + i) : list (mm_instr (pos n))
mm_transfert_progress : forall src dst zero : pos n, src <> dst -> src <> zero -> dst <> zero -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>dst = 0 -> v#>zero = 0 -> st = (3 + i, v[0/src][(v#>src)/dst]) -> (i, mm_transfert src dst zero i) // (i, v) -+> st
mm_mul2_progress : forall src dst zero : pos n, src <> dst -> src <> zero -> dst <> zero -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>dst = 0 -> v#>zero = 0 -> st = (4 + i, v[0/src][(2 * (v#>src))/dst]) -> (i, mm_mul2 src dst zero i) // (i, v) -+> st
mm_div2_progress : forall src quo rem : pos n, src <> quo -> src <> rem -> quo <> rem -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>quo = 0 -> v#>rem = 0 -> let (k, b) := div2 (v#>src) in (i, mm_div2 src quo rem i) // (i, v) -+> (6 + i, v[0/src][k/quo][(if b then 1 else 0)/rem])
mm_div2_progress_0 : forall src quo rem : pos n, src <> quo -> src <> rem -> quo <> rem -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (k : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>quo = 0 -> v#>rem = 0 -> div2 (v#>src) = (k, Zero) -> st = (6 + i, v[0/src][k/quo][0/rem]) -> (i, mm_div2 src quo rem i) // (i, v) -+> st
mm_div2_progress_1 : forall src quo rem : pos n, src <> quo -> src <> rem -> quo <> rem -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (k : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>quo = 0 -> v#>rem = 0 -> div2 (v#>src) = (k, One) -> st = (6 + i, v[0/src][k/quo][1/rem]) -> (i, mm_div2 src quo rem i) // (i, v) -+> st
mm_null_progress : forall src zero : pos n, src <> zero -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>zero = 0 -> st = (2 + i, v[0/src]) -> (i, mm_null src zero i) // (i, v) -+> st
pos_eq_dec : forall (n : nat) (x y : pos n), {x = y} + {x <> y}
vec_one_spec_neq : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), p <> q -> vec_one p#>q = 0
mm_null_length : forall (src zero : pos n) (i : nat), length (mm_null src zero i) = 2
mm_mul2_length : forall (src dst zero : pos n) (i : nat), length (mm_mul2 src dst zero i) = 4
mm_div2_length : forall (src quo rem : pos n) (i : nat), length (mm_div2 src quo rem i) = 6
mm_transfert_length : forall (src dst zero : pos n) (i : nat), length (mm_transfert src dst zero i) = 3
nth_error_Some : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat), nth_error l n <> None < -> n < length l
vec_change_neq : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p q : pos n) (x : X), p <> q -> v[x/p]#>q = v#>q
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
VectorSpec.replace_replace_neq : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (p1 p2 : pos n) (v : vec A n) (a b : A), p1 <> p2 -> VectorDef.replace (VectorDef.replace v p1 a) p2 b = VectorDef.replace (VectorDef.replace v p2 b) p1 a
mm_div2 = fun (src quo rem : pos n) (i : nat) => DECₐ src (6 + i) :: INCₐ rem :: DECₐ src (i + 6) :: DECₐ rem (4 + i) :: INCₐ quo :: DECₐ rem i :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments mm_div2 _ _ _ _%nat_scope
mm_nullify_compute : forall (zero : pos n) (i : nat) (lr : list (pos n)) (v w : vec nat n), v#>zero = 0 -> (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> p <> zero) -> (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> w#>p = 0) -> (forall p : pos n, ~ In p lr -> w#>p = v#>p) -> (i, mm_nullify zero i lr) // (i, v) -> > (length (mm_nullify zero i lr) + i, w)
mm_null = fun (src zero : pos n) (i : nat) => DECₐ src (2 + i) :: DECₐ zero i :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments mm_null _ _ _%nat_scope
mm_transfert = fun (src dst zero : pos n) (i : nat) => DECₐ src (3 + i) :: INCₐ dst :: DECₐ zero i :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments mm_transfert _ _ _ _%nat_scope
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (p, v) -[k'] -> st
mm_mul2 = fun (src dst zero : pos n) (i : nat) => let dst' := dst in DECₐ src (4 + i) :: INCₐ dst :: INCₐ dst' :: DECₐ zero i :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments mm_mul2 _ _ _ _%nat_scope
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_nullify_length : forall (zero : pos n) (i : nat) (lr : list (pos n)), length (mm_nullify zero i lr) = 2 * length lr
mm_push_Zero_length = eq_refl : length mm_push_Zero = 7
partition_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> length l = length l1 + length l2
